AlterCluster.name: AlterCluster
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
AlterCluster.description:
Grants permission to alter various aspects of the cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's
                                                ALTER CLUSTER ACL

AlterClusterDynamicConfiguration.name: AlterClusterDynamicConfiguration
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
AlterClusterDynamicConfiguration.description:
Grants permission to alter the dynamic configuration of a cluster, equivalent to Apache
                                                Kafka's ALTER_CONFIGS CLUSTER ACL

AlterGroup.name: AlterGroup
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
AlterGroup.description:
Grants permission to join groups on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's READ GROUP
                                                ACL

AlterTopic.name: AlterTopic
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
AlterTopic.description:
Grants permission to alter topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's ALTER
                                                TOPIC ACL

AlterTopicDynamicConfiguration.name: AlterTopicDynamicConfiguration
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
AlterTopicDynamicConfiguration.description:
Grants permission to alter the dynamic configuration of topics on a cluster, equivalent
                                                to Apache Kafka's ALTER_CONFIGS TOPIC ACL

AlterTransactionalId.name: AlterTransactionalId
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
AlterTransactionalId.description:
Grants permission to alter transactional IDs on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's
                                                WRITE TRANSACTIONAL_ID ACL

Connect.name: Connect
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
Connect.description: Grants permission to connect and authenticate to the cluster

CreateTopic.name: CreateTopic
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
CreateTopic.description:
Grants permission to create topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's CREATE
                                                CLUSTER/TOPIC ACL

DeleteGroup.name: DeleteGroup
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
DeleteGroup.description:
Grants permission to delete groups on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's DELETE
                                                GROUP ACL

DeleteTopic.name: DeleteTopic
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
DeleteTopic.description:
Grants permission to delete topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's DELETE
                                                TOPIC ACL

DescribeCluster.name: DescribeCluster
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
DescribeCluster.description:
Grants permission to describe various aspects of the cluster, equivalent to Apache
                                                Kafka's DESCRIBE CLUSTER ACL

DescribeClusterDynamicConfiguration.name: DescribeClusterDynamicConfiguration
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
DescribeClusterDynamicConfiguration.description:
Grants permission to describe the dynamic configuration of a cluster, equivalent to
                                                Apache Kafka's DESCRIBE_CONFIGS CLUSTER ACL

DescribeGroup.name: DescribeGroup
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
DescribeGroup.description:
Grants permission to describe groups on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's DESCRIBE
                                                GROUP ACL

DescribeTopic.name: DescribeTopic
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
DescribeTopic.description:
Grants permission to describe topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's DESCRIBE
                                                TOPIC ACL

DescribeTopicDynamicConfiguration.name: DescribeTopicDynamicConfiguration
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
DescribeTopicDynamicConfiguration.description:
Grants permission to describe the dynamic configuration of topics on a cluster, equivalent
                                                to Apache Kafka's DESCRIBE_CONFIGS TOPIC ACL

DescribeTransactionalId.name: DescribeTransactionalId
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
DescribeTransactionalId.description:
Grants permission to describe transactional IDs on a cluster, equivalent to Apache
                                                Kafka's DESCRIBE TRANSACTIONAL_ID ACL

ReadData.name: ReadData
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
ReadData.description:
Grants permission to read data from topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's
                                                READ TOPIC ACL

WriteData.name: WriteData
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
WriteData.description:
Grants permission to write data to topics on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's
                                                WRITE TOPIC ACL

WriteDataIdempotently.name: WriteDataIdempotently
topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
WriteDataIdempotently.description:
Grants permission to write data idempotently on a cluster, equivalent to Apache Kafka's
                                                IDEMPOTENT_WRITE CLUSTER ACL

topics: Apache Kafka APIs for Amazon MSK clusters
